item.title: This Cylinder Eye Is in Dire Need of Help
item.description: A worn and damaged cylinder eye arrives in rough shape. This piece follows the inspection, machining prep, and the steps needed to bring it back to safe working condition.

media:content.media:title: This Cylinder Eye Is in Dire Need of Help
media:content.media:description: A worn and damaged cylinder eye arrives in rough shape. This piece follows the inspection, machining prep, and the steps needed to bring it back to safe working condition.

item.title: Answering Your Questions — Q&A Time
item.description: From machining techniques to workshop tools, this session tackles the questions viewers ask most. Clear explanations and practical insights make it a helpful look behind the scenes.

item.title: DIY Heavy‑Duty Drop‑Bottom Bins for the Workshop
item.description: Strong, practical, and built to last — these custom drop‑bottom bins make material handling easier. This breakdown shows the design, fabrication steps, and how they improve workflow in a busy shop.

media:content.media:title: DIY Heavy‑Duty Drop‑Bottom Bins for the Workshop
media:content.media:description: Strong, practical, and built to last — these custom drop‑bottom bins make material handling easier. This breakdown shows the design, fabrication steps, and how they improve workflow in a busy shop.

item.title: Dustless Blasting in Action — Stripping Paint and Rust
item.description: The RapidBlast system goes to work as old paint and rust disappear, revealing a clean surface ready for machining and repair. This piece highlights the process, the equipment, and the results of dustless blasting in the workshop.

media:content.media:title: Dustless Blasting in Action — Stripping Paint and Rust
media:content.media:description: The RapidBlast system goes to work as old paint and rust disappear, revealing a clean surface ready for machining and repair. This piece highlights the process, the equipment, and the results of dustless blasting in the workshop.

item.title: First Deep Clean for a 3‑Jaw Chuck Since New
item.description: After years of use, this 3‑jaw chuck is finally getting opened up for a full clean. Watch the teardown and maintenance that keep the lathe running smooth and accurate.

media:content.media:description: After years of use, this 3‑jaw chuck is finally getting opened up for a full clean. Watch the teardown and maintenance that keep the lathe running smooth and accurate.

item.title: Cleaning a 3‑Jaw Chuck for the First Time Since New
item.description: This 3‑jaw chuck hasn’t been opened since it was brand new. It’s finally time to crack it apart, clean out the buildup, and get it running smoothly again.

media:content.media:title: Cleaning a 3‑Jaw Chuck for the First Time Since New
media:content.media:description: This 3‑jaw chuck hasn’t been opened since it was brand new. It’s finally time to crack it apart, clean out the buildup, and get it running smoothly again.

item.title: Finished Repairing the Broken D11 Ripper Shank
item.description: The D11 ripper shank repair is complete. Drilling, machining, and careful finishing restore this massive component to full working order.
